pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prediction of Antimicrobial Peptides // Predicts antimicrobial peptides using random forests trained on the n-gram encoded peptides. The implemented algorithm can be accessed from both the command line and shiny-based GUI. The AmpGram model is too large for CRAN and it has to be downloaded separately from the repository: https://github.com/michbur/AmpGramModel.
